title: When is riot is going fix the f****** client
body: I'm sick and tired of getting leaver busters because the game doesn't load in until the game becomes a remake. like right now i have to wait 10 minutes before even starting to look for a game because of this bug

replies.body: Sorry for this frustrating period you're going through, but I'm really not sure what issue you're having.  Give me some more details on what's going on, or error messages, and I'd be happy to help get this solved with you.  Let me know!

Hello Dark,

I am sorry this is happening to you and you are getting leaverbustered. I have had a few leaverbusters in the past myself when I d/c'd (I live in Alaska so the connection is horrible). 

What you could try to do is the following: (1) run a full file repair (click the cogwheel at the top right), (2) if the file repair doesn't work then you can download the hextech repair tool here --> https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool and run it, and (3) if the hextech tool doesn't work then you can send the logs it provides to Riot Support and they can help you (https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). I hope this helps you!
